messages.title: THE BIGGEST LIE WE WERE TOLD
messages.content: Weeks after the last Welsh Assembly Election in 2011 Labour tell us the A&E promised...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Call for at least 2 new primary schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: To be constructed to help with demand for places

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Press the council to offer free car parking in town centres

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY LABOUR CAN BEAT LABOUR IN CAERPHILLY. Last years general election results

issues.health: Fight for a 24 hour A&E at Ystrad Mynach Hospital

housing.content: Protect our greenfield sites from housebuilding

leaflet.personalStatement: Caerphilly is my home, whether I win or lose I will be fighting for a better Caerphilly. I have lived the majority of my married life and have 3 young children and run a number of businesses here.

contactInformation.address: Published & promoted by: Sam Gould, 3 Pant Llygodfa, Caerphilly, CF83 1TT. Printed in Wales on paper from sustainable FSC certified sources by: The Print Co (West) Ltd, 218 Springvale, Cwmbran NP44 5BJ

images.caption: A photo of Sam Gould and graphic representations of pledges.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet does not include specific mention of an election date, policy details for several proposals, or direct quotes for the quotes section.
